import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import Footer from '../myPortfolio/Footer' import Navbar from '../myPortfolio/Navbar' import { dataContext } from './context/DataContext'; function Blog() { const context = useContext(dataContext); const [data, setData] = useState([]) context.blogListesi().then((res) => { setData(res.data); }) return ( <>
{ data.map((item, index) => { return (
{item.title}

{item.description}

Creation Date : {item.date}

) }) }

Modal title

...
) } export default Blog
